tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"强击箭","italic": false}',Lore:['[{"text":"为弓附加高等级","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"冲击","underlined": true},"。",{"text":"（大幅提高击退距离）","color":"dark_gray"}]','{"text":"相比其他箭矢，它的伤害要高出一些。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','[{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"3 秒","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":"      ⚜ 储存  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"5 支","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"❤ 伤害  ","italic": false,"color":"red"},{"text":"10.5 - 19.25（满弦）","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
